problem_text_cn: 如图,直线l过正方形ABCD的顶点D,点A、C到直线l的距离分别是1和2,则正方形ABCD的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line l passes the vertex D of the square ABCD, and the distances from points A and C to the straight line l are N_0 and N_1 respectively, then the area of ​​the square ABCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是正方形,∴AD=CD,∠ADC=90°,∵AE⊥EF,CF⊥EF,∴∠AED=∠DFC=90°,∴∠ADE+∠CDF=180°-90°=90°,∠ADE+∠EAD=90°,∴∠EAD=∠CDF,∵在△AED和△DFC中\begin{cases}∠AED=∠DFC\\∠EAD=∠CDF\\AD=CD\\\end{cases},∴△AED≌△DFC(AAS),∴DE=CF=2,在Rt△AED中,由勾股定理得:AD=√{1²{+2}²}=√{5},即正方形ABCD的面积是(√{5})²=5．故选:D．
